column3: question
1. Little interest or pleasure in doing things
2. Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless
3. Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
4. Feeling tired or having little energy
5. Poor appetite or overeating
6. Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
7. Difficulty concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
8. Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
9. Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself
10. Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
11. Not being able to stop or control worrying
12. Worrying too much about different things
13. Trouble relaxing
14. Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
15. Becoming easily annoyed or irritable
16. Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen
17. If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you at work, home, or with other people?
1. Do you happen to experience temper outbursts in response to relatively milder situations multiple times through the week?
2. Would you say that you are persistently irritable or angry most of the day, nearly every day?
3. Do you have excessive and persistent worries about specific situations?
4. Does the specific situation always provoke anxiety?
5. Is the worry out of proportion to the actual threat?
6. Do you avoid the specific situation of worry or fear?
7. Do you have physical symptoms for worry or fear?
8. Do you have trouble speaking or unable to speak in specific situations in-spite of speaking in other situations?
9. Is the worry and related symptoms affecting your day to day activities?
10. Do you have excessive anxiety and worry (apprehensive expectation) occurring most of the day?
11. Which one of the following age groups apply to you?
12. What gender do you identify as?
13. Have you ever been diagnosed with any mental disorder?(Please answer Yes/No If your answer is yes, please specify.)
14. Do you have any medical conditions present that may induce symptoms of mental disorder?(Please answer Yes/No If your answer is yes, please specify.)
15. Do you have any history of substance usage or medication that may induce symptoms of mental disorder?(Please answer Yes/No If your answer is yes, please specify.)
16. How long has it been since you experienced at least one of the symptoms you answered yes to?
column4: I don't have any of the symptoms
column6: More than 2 weeks but less than 1 month
column7: More than 1 month but less than 6 months
column8: More than 6 months but less than 2 years
